OASIS Test Descriptions

1 Empty file. Various ways to specify a float (database unit).

1.1 Empty file (no cell, just header)

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Basic reader capabilities
  • Real data type 0 (for database unit)
  • Database unit setting
  • PAD record reading

Normalized content:

begin_lib 0.001
end_lib

1.2 Empty file (no cell, just header)

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Basic reader capabilities
  • Real data type 2 (for database unit)
  • Database unit setting

Normalized content:

begin_lib 2
end_lib

3 Texts. Various ways to specify text strings and to refer to them.

3.10 A single cell with one text object

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Geometrical objects reader capabilities
  • TEXT record reading
  • Text string specification by ID
  • Implicit assignment of text ID
  • Access to (automatically) initialised modal variable text-y

Normalized content:

begin_lib 0.001
begin_cell {ABC}
text 1 2 0 0 {100 0} {A}
end_cell
end_lib

3.11 A single cell with one text object

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Geometrical objects reader capabilities
  • TEXT record reading
  • Access to uninitialised modal variable text-string

3.12 A single cell with several text object

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Geometrical objects reader capabilities
  • TEXT record reading
  • Text string specification by ID
  • Forward string ID references
  • Explicit assignment for text string ID
  • Text string backward references
  • Modal variables for text objects
  • Various repetition types for text objects

3.1 A single cell with several text object

Back to top

Test targets:

  • Geometrical objects reader capabilities
  • TEXT record reading
  • Text string specification by string directly
  • Modal variables for text objects
  • Various repetition types for text objects
